data.text: @BruceBartlett People who don't care about themselves don't care about others

@sky_invisible @BruceBartlett You clearly don’t watch Fox and go by talking points. MANY encouraged vaccines and almost all  said they personally got vaccinated, as did some of their kids. You retweet Occupy Democrats and you’re bashing Fox?🤣🤣
@sky_invisible Rupert Murdoch makes billions of dollars per year pandering to the stupidest people in America, Australia, and the UK. He has much blood on his hands.

@BruceBartlett I’ll never understand the strategy of Fox misleading their low information, ignorant viewers about the advantages of wearing masks (during peak infections) and getting vaccinated when they are all likely vaccinated and took precautions behind the scenes to keep themselves safe.
@BruceBartlett This understates the voluntary deaths on the Trump side when you consider where the early infections hit hardest.

@BruceBartlett In the abstract, I agree, but 1, some are friends or relatives, 2, the pandemic isn’t over until people stop dying, 3, most of the unvaccinated will survive and will thus think they are geniuses and right all along, and 4, we have to coexist with them for the near future.
@BruceBartlett Now it's Darwin's law in action...
